Residuals for result of dream

Source: R/fitMixedModelDE.R
residuals.MArrayLM2.Rd

Residuals for result of dream

Usage

residuals.MArrayLM2(object, y, ..., type = c("response", "pearson"))

Arguments

object

See ?stats::residuals

y

EList object used in dream()

...

See ?stats::residuals

type

compute either response or pearson residuals
